oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The part of Bushmanland formerly occupied by //kabbo. Given by /han=kasso (L VIII.-14. 7215-7217). A place called '||gubo' by the |xam is called 'Blaauwpits' by the 'Bastaards' because the rocks there are black slate. ||gubo is also ||kabbo's (Jantje Tooren's) place. 1) p.7214v: the personal history of a person called |utta, 2) p.7215v: a note about ||xuobbeten (see ||xuobbeten and the lion), 3) p.7216v: a note on a mole found in Bushmanland and a comment on those found at Mowbray, 4) This story is found in Book VIII-14.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Places of the |xam
